Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.AvatarAsset.description: The response model for checking if captcha is needed for uploading an avatar asset

message.description: The message field for running the captcha prompt on the client

fieldData.description: An arbitrary string of field data for use with the given captcha provider

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.GetAvatarAs.description: Defines the request model for getting the upload fee for creating an avatar asset
Defines the response model for the v1/avatar-assets/{assetType}/get-upload-fee endpoint

price.description: Gets the price in Robux required to be paid in order to upload

canAfford.description: Indicates whether the creator can afford the upload price

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.UploadAvata.description: Defines the request model for uploading a new avatar asset
Defines the response model for the v1/avatar-assets/{assetType}/upload endpoint

robuxAmountPaid.description: Gets the amount of Robux paid as an upload fee

allowedAssetTypeForUpload.description: Gets Dictionary of all allowed assetTypes that can be uploaded, along with the relevant upload related metadata

allowedAssetTypesForRelease.description: Gets Dictionary of all allowed assetTypes that can be released, along with the relevant release related metadata

allowedAssetTypesForFree.description: Gets Array of all allowed assetTypes that can be free

allowedAssetTypesForSaleAvailabilityLoca.description: Gets Array of all allowed assetTypes that have the custom sale availability locations feature enabled

allowedFileExtensions.description: List of string specifiying allowed file extentions for upload

minRobux.description: Minimum price in Robux to release the asset

maxRobux.description: Maximum price in Robux to release the asset

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.AllowedPrem.description: Defines the metadata for reading about allowed premium pricing rules

allowedDiscountPercentages.description: The allowed discount percentages for a Premium discount

allowedPriceRange.description: The allowed price range for Premium-only pricing

price.description:
The Price for onSale asset
Note: This is now considered deprecated in favor of PriceConfiguration

priceConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the price configuration for the asset

releaseConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the release configuration for the asset

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.PriceConfig.description: Defines the configuration options for an items price

priceInRobux.description: Gets or sets the standard price of the item in Robux

premiumDiscountPercentage.description:
Gets or sets the discount rate on the price of the item that is given to premium users
Should not be used while applying a PremiumPriceInRobux

premiumPriceInRobux.description:
Gets or sets the price of the item in Robux that applies only to premium users
Should not be used while applying a PremiumDiscountPercentage

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.ReleaseConf.description: Defines the configuration options associated with releasing an item

saleAvailabilityLocations.description: Get or sets the sale availability locations list

id.description: Gets or sets the item id

itemTags.description: Gets or sets the item tag details related to this item

id.description: Gets or sets the item tag id

tag.description: Gets or sets the tag details related to this item tag

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.TagDetails.description: The tag model for any tag-related gets

tagId.description: Gets or sets the tag Id

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the tag

localizedDisplayName.description: Gets or sets the localized display name of the tag

status.description: Gets or sets the status for the fetch of this tag

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.CreateItemT.description: Request model to add a tag to an item

itemId.description: Gets or sets the item Id

tagId.description: Gets or sets the tag Id

isItemTagsFeatureEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item tags feature is enabled

enabledAssetTypes.description: Gets or sets the asset types where item tagging is enabled.

maximumItemTagsPerItem.description: Gets or sets the maximum item tags per item limit

Roblox.ItemConfiguration.Api.GetSellingF.description: Defines the response model for the /v1/assets/{assetId}/get-selling-fee endpoint

price.description: Gets the price in Robux required to be paid in order to upload
